citeinfo.origin: The North Carolina Department of Transportation Geographic Information Systems Unit
citeinfo.title: MunicipalBoundaries

pubinfo.publish: The North Carolina Department of Transportation Geographic Information Systems Unit

descript.abstract: The North Carolina Department of Transportation - GIS Unit developed the digital GIS Municipal Boundaries - Powell Bill 2012 data set from the 2012 Powell Bill boundaries which incorporated municipalities in North Carolina that participate in the Powell Bill Program are required to submit to NCDOT on a regular basis. Boundaries of municipalities which do not participate in the Powell Bill Program are also included in the layer. These boundaries are periodically updated from maps and GIS data submitted by the local towns or counties to the North Carolina Department of Transportation - GIS Unit. Sources for the boundaries vary in scale and format based on what was supplied.
descript.purpose: These data were created to assist governmental agencies and others in making resource management decisions through use of a Geographic Information System (GIS). Municipal boundaries are recognized as a base cartographic layer for location analysis.
descript.supplinf:
2012 Powell Bill Information: 508 Cities/Towns are participating in the Powell Bill Program.
Fontana Dam and Bermuda Run were added as first time Powell Bill participants this year.
US Census Bureau 2010 population data for Fontana Dam and Santeelah were not available, therefore the population for these towns was not updated.
45 Cities/Towns are not participating in the Powell Bill Program, but are incorporated and are included in the layer.
Total: 553 Cities/Towns.
Powell Bill Participants are responsible for submitting paper maps to the NCDOT Powell Bill Administration annually, if there have been changes to their boundaries since the previous year. For the Powell Bill Participants, the NCDOT GIS Unit updates the boundaries for the municipalities that have submitted maps. For Non-Powell Bill Participants, the NCDOT GIS Unit updates the boundaries periodically. Sources for these updates come from contacting the local government agencies.
Attributes for all municipalities are updated on an annual basis, where applicable.

idinfo.useconst: The North Carolina Department of Transportation shall not be held liable for any errors in this data. This includes errors of omission, commission, errors concerning the content of the data, and relative and positional accuracy of the data. This data cannot be constructed to be a legal document. idinfo.datacred: These data are maintained by the Data Conversion Group of the North Carolina Department of Transportation - GIS Unit.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

attracc.attraccr: There are no measurement, precision, spatial or data schema standards assigned to this data set. Some informal attribute validation was applied.

dataqual.logic: Topology was verified to check for overlapping polygons.
dataqual.complete: These data represent the locations and identities of incorporated municipalities in North Carolina according to the North Carolina State Demographics Unit.

horizpa.horizpar:
The accuracy of the individual municipal boundaries in this data set vary according to the sources of the boundaries and other resources used as reference to digitize the boundaries. Sources for the boundaries vary in scale and format based on whatever the municipality supplied. Other resources used as reference are submitted do the Department of Transportation - GIS Unit by local government agencies in GIS format.
The Department of Transportation - GIS Unit should be contacted for specific information on a particular municipality.

procstep.procdesc: The North Carolina Department of Transportation collects town and city maps of various scales from municipalities participating in the Powell Bill Program. Maps and GIS Layers of municipalities that do not participate in the Powell Bill Program are also collected periodically.
The North Carolina Department of Transportation - GIS Unit Data Conversion Group digitizes the boundaries. The digital files are compared for accuracy against the originals.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: County that contains the largest land area of each municipality
County that contains the second largest land area of each municipality
County that contains the third largest land area of each municipality
County that contains the fourth largest land area of each municipality
DOT Division that contains the majority land area of each municipality, used for maintaining layer

edom.edomv: Indicates Powell Bill Participants for the year 2012
edom.edomvds:
Y: municipality that participated in Powell Bill Program for 2012
N: municipality that did not participate in Powell Bill Program for 2012

attr.attrdef: Indicates most recent change to municipal boundary since 2005
attr.attrdefs: NCDOT Powell Bill Administration and NCDOT GIS

edom.edomvds:
Changed: Indicates an offical change to the boundary according to standard processes for updating boundaries (see note below).
Not Changed: Indicates the boundary has not been updated since 2005.
Verified: Indicates the boundary has been reviewed using the Powell Bill map or local map (for Non-Powell Bill towns) for that year and the boundary has not been updated.
Updated: Indicates the boundary has been reviewed using the Powell Bill map or local map (for Non-Powell Bill towns) for that year and the boundary has been updated.
Note: Powell Bill Participants are responsible for submitting paper maps to the NCDOT Powell Bill Administration annually, if there have been changes to their boundaries since the previous year. For the Powell Bill Participants, the NCDOT GIS Unit updates the boundaries for the municipalities that have submitted maps. For Non-Powell Bill Participants, the NCDOT GIS Unit updates the boundaries periodically. Sources for these updates come from contacting the local government agencies.

attr.attrdefs: NCDOT Powell Bill Administration and NCDOT GIS

attrdomv.udom: Year of Change (0 indicates an unknown year prior to 2005)

attr.attrdefs: North Carolina Powell Bill Administration and the North Carolina State Demographics Unit
North Carolina Powell Bill Administration and the North Carolina State Demographics Unit

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.
